GameDBLocalizedString.Text: Intravenöse Substituation des Proteins Alpha-1 Antitrypsin. \n\Benötigter Raum: Büros / Diagnostik in Chirurgie, Innere Medizin / ITS / Station / Überwachung

Endoscopic cauterizing is surgical procedure through the upper part of digestive tract. Cateurizing is a specialized medical practice of burning tissue to remove or close off a part of it.
